channel.title: Oats on Flo's Food and Drink
channel.description: Recent content in Oats on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: New Zealand Biscuits
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 4 ozs sugar
  • 4 ozs butter
  • 1 heaped tablespoon of Golden Syrup
  • 2 ozs dessicated coconut
  • 3 ozs rolled oats
  • 4 ozs plain flour
  • 2 level teaspoons bicarbonate of soda

Method

Melt the butter with the sugar & golden syrup then let it bubble for approx. 2 minutes

Add the dry ingredients & mix well

Place walnut sized portions (well spaced) on to a well greased baking sheet, approx. 12 to a sheet

item.title: Oatmeal Cookies
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1 stick butter
  • 1 cup light brown sugar
  • 1/2 cup granulated sugar
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla
  • 1/4 cup water and 2 eggs well beaten
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup flour, sifted
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
  • About 1 cup oatmeal
  • Chopped nuts (walnuts preferred)

Directions

Mix in order and drop on baking sheet. Bake 400Â° 7 to 8 minutes. Then run under broiler to brown
